meaningMnemonic: The only <radical>feeling</radical> a dead <radical>soul</radical> will have is <kanji>remorse</kanji>. Remorse for the people it left behind. <kanji>Regret</kanji>s for the things it did and didn't do.
readingMnemonic: The soul with the most <kanji>regret</kanji>s is Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん). Everyone knows to stay away from him in the spirit world because he's so sad. Not because of his own actions, but because of the state of his people now.
